OrgName.entry: FEDERATION OF SMALL BUSINESSES, SOUTH YORKSHIRE BRANCH

Desc.entry: National organisation with over 212,000 members representing the interests of the self-employed and small business sector. FSB provides legal protection for member businesses and campaigns for the removal of tax and 'Red Tape' burdens which hinder the progress of the small business sector. In addition provides a range of exclusive low-cost member services to reduce overheads and operational costs to members.
